title: Reports
body: When you forget to report someone after the game and leave the menu. You try everything to report that person. Please Riot, give us another chance to report the person again. People like that are people who are ruining league. Please reply if you agree.

replies.body: Do your best to report in post-game for sure, but if something like a crash happens you can grab a screenshot (from replay if needed) and send it over in a ticket so we can take a look as well.

The  German Rioters told me that the post-game screen is perfect enough and they don't look into screenshots sent :/

I won games by ignoring people and hoping you'd report them but you didn't.
I don't get it, the saltiest players flame but don't play particularly good or are insanely bad at times. 
However if they don't get banned, they make everyone's experience to a toxic pile of unbearable dump thrown at one's face.
There's no need to say it's impossible to make a discussion with someone talking like that.

It can go from people on normal games being overly competitive, and therefore overly sensitive. It can be as simple thing as they losing their Toplane. The Toplaner flamed the Jungle they were are Inbred. This report didn't come through.

Or 2 premades flaming and gossiping the entire game, despite being carried and every kill you make was a KS. They die, you are trash, because you didn't save them when they went in 2 vs 5. You can save your Toplaner but they ping you not to do it. You listen, you lose. 
So at the end game I muted them, knowing what I read through early and midgame so I can type a concrete report.
The report didn't came through. 

So this leaves one to either go to preban Tyler1 mode or to quit Leauge for its low social standards. 

But yeah, let's lose all social standards.
